#summary High Level view of the Data Load Process
= ETL Pieces for loading data from partners

== Exchange Ð listing partner data enters the system ==
  * Receive FPXML post
  * Get from external API
  * Manually updated Spreadsheet
  * Crawl site

== Transform Ð Convert to FPXML if not in that form ==
  * Partner specific parsers
  * Field/Category/Organization mappers
  * Spreadsheet reader

== Load Ð Insert FPXML strucutred data into Data Store ==
  * Insert opportunities into SOLR/GoogleBase instance
